_sText:
Well who ever said shields is ony for 1.6 lied :P

here it is :)  A shield for CSS :D

just pick the deagle up and the shield will stay infront of you every where untill you drop the gun.

this prefab might also be usefull for ZM maps ...


the shields health is 500 by defult right now , its easy to change.




enjoy your shield(s) ! 


PS better looking V2 on its way !
